title: Transfer Season Opens With a Bang: Super Teams Gobble Up Zingle, Narváez, Jayco-AlUla Pens O’Connor
content:
August 1 marks the 'official' opening of the transfer market, though deals are sealed months ago: The richest teams continue to pounce on most promising talent.

Read the full article at Transfer Season Opens With a Bang: Super Teams Gobble Up Zingle, Narváez, Jayco-AlUla Pens O’Connor on Velo.
author: ahood
